title: A Way to Eliminate Vote Bots
body:
Remove the vote system altogether. A topic that generates interest does not necessarily need a number indicating how liked or disliked it is. People are quite capable of putting their own thoughts and opinions into words, emotes, or even images and gifs.

Bots have abused the vote system for a very long time.Recently, however, downvote bots have increased in activity. Maybe it is time to do away with the vote system altogether.
